Attackdex

Name Type Category PP Power Accuracy Description
Aqua Cutter 20 70 100 Expels pressurized water to cut the foe. It lands critical hits more easily.
Aqua Jet 20 40 100 The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It always goes first.
Aqua Ring 20 — — The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP every turn.
Aqua Step 10 80 100 The user attacks the target using fluid dance steps. This also boosts its Speed stat.
Aqua Tail 10 90 90 The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.
Bouncy Bubble 15 90 100 An attack that absorbs half the damage inflicted.
Brine 10 65 100 If the target's HP is half or less, this attack will hit with double the power.
Bubble 30 40 100 Countless bubbles are jetted at opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their Speed stat.
Bubble Beam 20 65 100 A spray of bubbles is ejected at the target. This may also lower its Speed stat.
Chilling Water 20 50 100 The user showers the target with frigid water. This lowers the target's Attack stat.
Clamp 15 35 85 The target is clamped and squeezed by the user's shell for four to five turns.
Crabhammer 10 100 90 The target is hammered with a large pincer. Critical hits land more easily.
Dive 10 80 100 Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and attacks on the next turn.
Fishious Rend 10 85 100 If the user attacks before the target, the power of the user's hard gills is doubled.
Flip Turn 20 60 100 After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon.
Flooded Terrain 10 — — For 5 turns, Pokémon incapable of learning Surf are slowed and Water type-moves are stronger.
Hydro Cannon 5 150 90 The target is hit with a watery blast. The user can't move on the next turn.
Hydro Pump 5 110 80 The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.
Hydro Steam 15 80 100 Blasts the foe with boiling-hot water. It's power is boosted 50 percent in harsh sunlight.
Hydrofoil 20 50 100 The user slices with a hydrodynamic edge. This boosts the user's Speed stat.
Jet Punch 15 60 100 The user summons a torrent to punch at blinding speed. This move always goes first.
Life Dew 10 — — The user scatters mysterious water around, restoring the HP of itself and its ally Pokémon.
Liquidation 10 85 100 The user slams into the target with a blast of water. This may also lower its Defense stat.
Muddy Water 10 90 85 The user shoots muddy water at opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their accuracy.
Octazooka 10 65 85 The user attacks by spraying ink in the target's face or eyes. It may also lower its accuracy.
Origin Pulse 10 110 85 Opposing Pokémon are hit with countless beams of light that glow a deep and brilliant blue.
Polar Plunge 15 80 95 The target is crushed by ice cold water. This may leave it with paralysis.
Rain Dance 5 — — The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves.
Razor Shell 10 75 95 The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This may also lower its Defense stat.
Scald 15 80 100 The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. This may also leave it with a burn.
Snipe Shot 15 80 100 The user ignores moves and Abilities that draw in moves and hits the chosen target.
Soak 20 — 100 The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target's type to Water.
Sparkling Aria 10 90 100 The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles that cure burns.
Splishy Splash 15 90 100 A huge electrified wave that may paralyze the foe.
Steam Eruption 5 110 95 The user immerses the target in superheated steam. This may also leave it with a burn.
Surf 15 90 100 The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
Surging Strikes 5 25 100 The user strikes thrice with a flowing motion. This alttack always results in a critical hit.
Triple Dive 10 30 95 A perfectly timed triple dive hits three times in a row.
Water Gun 25 40 100 The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.
Water Pledge 10 80 100 When used with its fire equivalent, its power increases and a rainbow appears.
Water Pulse 20 60 100 The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse it.
Water Shuriken 20 15 100 The target is hit with throwing stars two to five times in a row. This move always goes first.
Water Sport 15 — 100 The user soaks the battlefield with water. This weakens Fire-type moves for five turns.
Water Spout 5 150 100 The user spouts water that scales with the user's HP to attack opposing Pokémon.
Waterfall 15 90 100 The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.
Wave Crash 10 120 100 The user shrouds itself in water and slams the foe. This also damages the user.
Whirlpool 15 35 85 The user traps the target in a violent swirling whirlpool for four to five turns.
Withdraw 20 — — The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.
